about_the_game:
Hungry Legion is a casual medieval fantasy action battle game. Manage one small group of warriors in a series of battles. After each battle you can expand your army with new troops. Battles get extremely challenging and death is always near you. Your troops can go through a lot but will eventually get exhausted if left without food for a very long time. So will the enemies...

Key features

  • Casual fast paced battles with procedurally generated armies in medieval fantasy style.
  • Fight through numerous obstacles on a landmass that is different every time you play
  • Each obstacle is a battle against a much larger enemy force
  • Battlefields are different every time you play, featuring plains, lakes, forests, deserts and other biomes.
  • Defeat enemies quickly to capture their food supply before they exhaust it
  • Small number of carefully designed weapons, armor and creatures (human, ghost, horse, bear etc) make up a diverse set of warrior types.
  • Units can carry other units as mounts, creating even more combinations.
